ru.ifmo.ctddev.nekrasov.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.nekrasov.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends Object
implements JarImpler
    Creates a class which extends some class or implement some interface, writes the resultant class to .java file, and if requested compiles it and writes resultant .class files to .jar file.

    Implements JarImpler.

    • Nested Class Summary

      private class  Implementor.HashableMethod
      Implements a method which is hashed, so it can be added to hashset.

    • Method Detail

      • implement

        public void implement(Class<?> parent,
                      File root)
               throws ImplerException
        Creates a class which extends some class or implement some interface, implementing default non-private constructors and non-private abstract methods.
        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        parent - a class or interface which the implemented class extended or implemented from
        root - root directory of the class's package system
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if parent is primitive, final or has no default non-private constructors

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(Class<?> parent,
                         File jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Creates a class calling implement(parent, jarFile) and then compiles it and packs it into a jar file.
        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        parent - a class or interface which the implemented class extended or implemented from
        jarFile - target .jar file
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if corresponding implement method throws it, the class hasn't been compiled or something hasn't been written to a jar file

      • writeConstructor

        private void writeConstructor(BufferedWriter writer,
                              Constructor constructor,
                              String className)
                       throws IOException
        Writes source code for a constructor, which calls superclass constructor with the same arguments.
        Parameters:
        writer - opened file to write to
        constructor - the constructor to write
        className - name of the constructor's class
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer throws it

      • writeMethod

        private void writeMethod(BufferedWriter writer,
                         Method method)
                  throws IOException
        Writes source code for a method, which returns standard value (false for boolean return type, 0 for integral type or null for an object) if it isn't void.
        Parameters:
        writer - opened file to write to
        method - the method to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer throws it

      • writeHeader

        private void writeHeader(BufferedWriter writer,
                         Executable executable,
                         String name)
                  throws IOException
        Writes an executable's (a constructor's or a method's) header.
        Parameters:
        writer - opened file to write to
        executable - the executable whose header is to write
        name - name of the executable
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer throws it

                            int modifiers)

        Writes executable's modifiers.
        Parameters:

        modifiers - the modifiers to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer throws it

      • getUniqueMethods

        private Set<Implementor.HashableMethod> getUniqueMethods(Class<?> clazz)
        Gets a set of unique abstract methods of the class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class with methods to get
        Returns:
        a Set of Implementor.HashableMethod

      • checkMethod

        private void checkMethod(Set<Implementor.HashableMethod> hashSet,
                         Method method,
                         boolean isAbstract)
        Adds an abstract method to a set or removes an implemented from the set.
        Parameters:
        hashSet - the set of methods to add to or to remove from
        method - the method to check
        isAbstract - if true it adds the method otherwise it removes

      • addEntry

        private void addEntry(File file,
                      JarOutputStream writer)
               throws IOException
        Adds an entry for a file to a .jar file. If the file is a directory it also creates entries for child files and directories.
        Parameters:
        file - a file which the entry is attached to
        writer - the .jar file to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if the entry hasn't been written to .jar file.
